review.title: “Not very satisfied, you don't have any private time.”
review.pros: Pros – learning, meeting people, become independent, know that have to deal with various situations...
review.cons: Cons – you have no private life, you do not have adequate conditions for field work, shall be borne the blame for everything, even for things that are not part of your job, you have no support from superiors
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – to be realistic and not to force their ideas and not achievable plans
